Version 2.2.6(April 24, 2014)
•   Fix bug issued by Nimon:  When multithread run the ssh tool by >10 threads will popup exception: the root cause is linux’s SSHD only allow 10 channel for every session, so fix it:  if found the opened session using channel >10, will new one new session.
